first_para: Charlotte Rose is an English sex worker, dominatrix, sexual trainer and political candidate from Nottingham who lives in London. In 2013 she won the "British Erotic Award for Sex Worker of the Year" and she is one of the judges of the Sexual Freedom Awards. In 2014 she took up politics, campaigning for sexual freedom as an independent candidate in the Clacton and Rochester and Strood by-elections.

full.extract: Charlotte Rose is an English sex worker, dominatrix, sexual trainer and political candidate from Nottingham who lives in London. In 2013 she won the "British Erotic Award for Sex Worker of the Year" and she is one of the judges of the Sexual Freedom Awards. In 2014 she took up politics, campaigning for sexual freedom as an independent candidate in the Clacton and Rochester and Strood by-elections.
full.title: Charlotte Rose
